solution_line_template: Both Polly and Peter played {total_moves} / {num_players} =<<{total_moves}/{num_players}={moves_per_player}>>{moves_per_player} moves each one

With an average of {polly_avg_seconds_per_move} seconds per move, Polly's moves lasted a total of {moves_per_player} * {polly_avg_seconds_per_move} = <<{moves_per_player}*{polly_avg_seconds_per_move}={polly_total_seconds}>>{polly_total_seconds} seconds.

With an average of {peter_avg_seconds_per_move} seconds per move, Peter's moves lasted a total of {moves_per_player}*{peter_avg_seconds_per_move}=<<{moves_per_player}*{peter_avg_seconds_per_move}={peter_total_seconds}>>{peter_total_seconds} seconds.
In total, the match lasted {polly_total_seconds} + {peter_total_seconds} = <<{polly_total_seconds}+{peter_total_seconds}={total_seconds_match}>>{total_seconds_match} seconds.
In minutes, the match lasted {total_seconds_match} / {seconds_per_minute} = <<{total_seconds_match}/{seconds_per_minute}={total_minutes_match}>>{total_minutes_match} minutes
